SELECT COMM_CD AS commCd ,HIGH_COMM_CD AS highCommCd ,COMM_NM AS commNm ,OPTION_CD AS optionCd ,USE_YN AS useYn ,COMM_DESC AS commDesc ,REG_DT AS regDt FROM MIND_COMM_CD WHERE 1=1 AND COMM_CD = #{commCd}

SELECT CENTER_SEQ AS centerSeq , CENTER_NM AS centerNm , CENTER_TYPE AS centerType , CENTER_INTRO AS centerIntro , HOMEPAGE AS homepage , AREA1 AS area1 , AREA2 AS area2 , POST AS post , ADDR1 AS addr1 , ADDR2 AS addr2 , INFRA_PERSONAL_CNT AS infraPersonalCnt , INFRA_WAIT_ROOM_YN AS infraWaitRoomYn , INFRA_PLAY_ROOM_CNT AS infraPlayRoomCnt , INFRA_EDU_ROOM_YN AS infraEduRoomYn , INFRA_ETC AS infraEtc , OWNER_NM AS ownerNm , BSNS_NUM AS bsnsNum , BCOND AS bcond , BITEM AS bitem , TEL_NUM AS telNum , FAX_NUM AS faxNum , BANK_CD AS bankCd , BANK_NM AS bankNum , BANK_ORDER AS bankOrder , FILE_NM1 AS fileNm1 , FILE_PATH1 AS filePath1 , FILE_NM2 AS fileNm2 , FILE_PATH2 AS filePath2 , FILE_NM3 AS fileNm3 , FILE_PATH3 AS filePath3 , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(REG_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDt , REG_ID AS regId , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(MODI_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modiDt , MODI_ID AS modiId , CALC_TYPE AS calcType , CALC_DD1 AS calcDd1 , CALC_DD2 AS calcDd2 , DISP_YN AS dispYn , MAP_URL AS mapUrl FROM MIND_CENTER ORDER BY CENTER_NM

SELECT FORMAT(B.CEILING_POINT, 0) FROM MIND_CLIENT_JEDO_PERIOD A INNER JOIN MIND_CEILING B ON A.PERIOD_SEQ = B.PERIOD_SEQ AND A.CLIENT_CD = B.CLIENT_CD WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd} AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN A.START_DD AND A.END_DD ORDER BY B.CLIENT_CD, B.PERIOD_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(START_DD, '%Y/%m/%d') AS startDd, DATE_FORMAT(END_DD, '%Y/%m/%d') AS endDd FROM MIND_CLIENT_JEDO_PERIOD WHERE 1=1 AND START_DD <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND END_DD >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND STATUS = 'Y' AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd}
